title: How to use Braun Face Exfoliation Brush | Becca Rose | Braun
description: Becca Rose has teamed up with Braun to talk about the Braun Face For Facial Epilation, which now has 3 interchangable heads for all your skin care needs. Here, she demonstrates the Exfoliation brush, which has super soft and dense bristles ideal for using

asset.author: Braun
asset.hookText:
Becca Rose has teamed up with Braun to talk about the Braun Face For Facial Epilation, which now has 3 interchangable heads for all your skin care needs. Here, she demonstrates the Exfoliation brush, which has super soft and dense bristles ideal for using daily for a gentle but thorough cleanse that leaves your skin feeling clean and soft. 
To use the brush, first moisten it then apply your cleanser to the bristles; Becca likes to use a gel cleanser. Now moisten your face and guide the brush with gentle pressure and circular motions for about a minute. Once you have finished, rinse the brush and your skin, then continue onto the next step of your beauty routine! 

Get a deep pore cleanse and break free from impurities with the Braun face.

 To learn more about the Braun products that Becca Rose has recommended for getting your skin moisturised and glowing, check out http://www.braun.com/global/female-grooming/braun-face.html and visit http://www.braun.com/global for more beauty and lifestyle products that make a difference!
